alert.note: Alert for Logan; Miami (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:58AM EDT until July 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM EDT FOR SHELBY...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...NORTHEASTERN DARKE...AUGLAIZE AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 358 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cridersville to Minster, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Wapakoneta, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Newport, Cridersville, Bradford, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Russells Point, Botkins, Lakeview, New Knoxville, Waynesfield, Chippewa Park, Hardin and Moulton. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 84 and 118. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
